items.name: Tankbuster
items.desc: Tankbuster: Every 3 seconds, deal 120% / 180% / 1600% AP as true damage to the enemy with the most Armor and Magic Resist.

items.name: Flamethrower
items.desc: Flamethrower: Constantly deal 30% / 45% / 600% AP magic damage in a cone.

items.name: Spare Parts!
items.desc: Keep your gold! Rumble permanently gains 3 Ability Power and 50 Health.

items.name: Self Destruct Button
items.desc: Self Destruct Button: Increase Armor and Magic Resist by 25%. On death, deal 160% / 240% / 2000% AR/MR as magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

items.name: Repairing Microbots
items.desc: Repairing Microbots: Every 3 seconds, restore 6% / 6% / 25% max HP.

items.name: Petricite Rod
items.desc: Petricite Rod: Every 5 seconds, fire a blast at the furthest enemy within 4 hexes that deals 350% / 525% / 6000% AP magic damage over 15 seconds.

items.name: Finishing Touch!
items.desc: Your mech is complete! Rumble permanently gains 25 Ability Power and 300 Health.

items.name: Junkyard Titan!
items.desc: Junkyard Titan!: Unlock all other upgrades! Gain 90% Durability.

items.name: Destabilized Chemtank
items.desc:
Recommend users: Renni and Singed
At 50% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield. Every 8 seconds afterwards, gain a 10% max Health Shield.

items.name: Perfected Destabilized Chemtank
items.desc:
Recommend users: Renni and Singed
At 50% Health, gain a 60% max Health Shield. Every 4 seconds afterwards, gain a 20% max Health Shield.

Perfected Bonus: After gaining Shield, fire a vial of chemicals at 3 nearby enemies that deals 15% max Health magic damage.

items.name: Destabilized Chemtank II
items.desc:
Recommend users: Renni and Singed
At 50% Health, gain a 50% max Health Shield. Every 8 seconds afterwards, gain a 10% max Health Shield.

items.name: Executioner's Chainblade
items.desc:
Recommend users: Smeech and Sevika
Attacks and Abilities execute enemies under 10% Health. On kill, gain 10% Durability and 10% Damage Amp for 5 seconds (refreshes on kills).

items.name: Executioner's Chainblade II
items.desc:
Recommend users: Smeech and Sevika
Attacks and Abilities execute enemies under 15% Health. On kill, gain 15% Durability and 15% Damage Amp for 5 seconds (refreshes on kills).

items.name: Perfected Executioner's Chainblade
items.desc:
Recommend users: Smeech and Sevika
Attacks and Abilities execute enemies under 20% Health. On kill, gain 15% Durability and 15% Damage Amp for 10 seconds (refreshes on kills).

Perfected Bonus: Executes drop 3 Gold and heals the holder for 400.

items.name: Flesh Ripper
items.desc:
Recommend users: Smeech and Sevika
After dropping below 40% Health, become briefly untargetable, restore 25% max Health, and gain 10% Attack Damage and 10% Omnivamp.

[Unique - only 1 per Chem-Baron]

items.name: Flesh Ripper II
items.desc:
Recommend users: Smeech and Sevika
After dropping below 40% Health, become briefly untargetable, restore 40% max Health, and gain 20% Attack Damage and 15% Omnivamp.

[Unique - only 1 per Chem-Baron]

items.name: Perfected Flesh Ripper
items.desc:
Recommend users: Smeech and Sevika
After dropping below 40% Health, become briefly Untargetable, restore 100% max Health, and gain 60% Attack Damage and 25% Omnivamp.

Perfected Bonus: Upon dying for the first time, revive with 100% max Health!

[Unique - only 1 per Chem-Baron]

items.name: Piltoven Hexarmor
items.desc:
Recommend users: Renni and Singed
Gain 3 Armor and Magic Resist when taking damage, stacking up to 15 times.

At max stacks, deal 50% ARMR as magic damage to enemies in a 1-hex radius after being attacked. (Cooldown: 2 seconds)

items.name: Piltoven Hexarmor II
items.desc:
Recommend users: Renni and Singed
Gain 5 Armor and Magic Resist when taking damage, stacking up to 15 times.

At max stacks, deal 75% ARMR as magic damage to enemies in a 1-hex radius after being attacked. (Cooldown: 2 seconds)

items.name: Perfected Piltoven Hexarmor
items.desc:
Recommend users: Renni and Singed
Gain 5 Armor and Magic Resist when taking damage, stacking up to 15 times.

Perfected Bonus: At max stacks, deal 50% ARMR as true damage to enemies in a 4-hex radius after being attacked. (Cooldown: 3 seconds)

items.name: Unleashed Toxins
items.desc:
Recommend users: Silco and Renata Glasc
Attacks grant 5 bonus Mana. After casting, launch 3 missiles at the current target that deal 100 magic damage.

items.name: Unleashed Toxins II
items.desc:
Recommend users: Silco and Renata Glasc
Attacks grant 5 bonus Mana. After casting, launch 3 missiles at the current target that deal 175 magic damage.

items.name: Perfected Unleashed Toxins
items.desc:
Recommend users: Silco and Renata Glasc
Attacks grant 10 bonus Mana. After casting, launch 4 missiles at the current target that deal 250 magic damage.

Perfected Bonus: Casts also launch a wave of toxins that deals 150 magic damage.

items.name: Virulent Virus
items.desc:
Recommend users: Silco and Renata Glasc
After dealing ability damage, enemies affected take an extra 15% damage over 3 seconds as true damage.

items.name: Virulent Virus II
items.desc:
Recommend users: Silco and Renata Glasc
After dealing ability damage, enemies affected take an extra 25% damage over 3 seconds as true damage.

items.name: Perfected Virulent Virus
items.desc:
Recommend users: Silco and Renata Glasc
After dealing ability damage, enemies affected take an extra 25% damage over 3 seconds as true damage.

Perfected Bonus: Infected enemies deal 15% less damage. When they die, they join your side with 800 Health that decays over 8 seconds.

items.name: Shimmer Bloom
items.desc:
Recommend users: Renni and Renata Glasc
Increase healing and shielding by 20%. Every 8 seconds, gain 300 Shield for 10 seconds and grant the same Shield to the 2 lowest Health allies.

items.name: Shimmer Bloom II
items.desc:
Recommend users: Renni and Renata Glasc
Increase healing and shielding by 35%. Every 8 seconds, gain 525 Shield for 10 seconds and grant the same Shield to the 2 lowest Health allies.

items.name: Perfected Shimmer Bloom
items.desc:
Recommend users: Renni and Renata Glasc
Increase healing and shielding by 40%. Every 6 seconds, gain 400 Shield for 10 seconds and grant the same Shield to the 3 lowest Health allies.

Perfected Bonus: Shielding or healing allies grants them 25 Ability Power and 25% Attack Speed.

items.name: Voltaic Saber
items.desc:
Recommend users: Sevika and Smeech
After every 6 instances of damage, send jolts towards the 2 lowest health enemies, dealing 150 physical damage.

items.name: Voltaic Saber II
items.desc:
Recommend users: Sevika and Smeech
After every 6 instances of damage, send jolts towards the 2 lowest health enemies, dealing 250 physical damage.

items.name: Perfected Voltaic Saber
items.desc:
Recommend users: Sevika and Smeech
After every 6 instances of damage, send jolts towards the 3 lowest health enemies, dealing 300 physical damage.

Perfected Bonus: Every time the holder fires bolts, they gain 20% Attack Speed.

items.name: Salvaged Gauntlet
items.desc:
Recommend users: Smeech and Sevika
Attacks deal an additional 15 true damage.

items.name: Salvaged Revolver
items.desc:
Recommend users: Silco and Renata Glasc
Gain 10 Ability Power every 5 seconds.

items.name: Salvaged Contraption
items.desc:
Recommend users: Renni and Singed
Reduce all incoming damage by 10.

items.name: Dimensional Heirloom
items.desc:
Combat start: Creates a pocket Anomaly that summons powerful allies from across the Convergence every 4 seconds.

Only Chem-Barons can use Illegal Items.

items.name: Portable Anomaly
items.desc: The holder gains your Anomaly evolution.

items.name: LesserShimmerDuplicator
items.desc: TBA

items.name: Miniature Champion
items.desc: Gain Ability Power, Attack Damage, Armor, and Magic Resist.

items.name: Confiscated!
items.desc: This dangerous item has been confiscated by the Enforcers. You can have it back after serving your time.

items.desc:
